definition[0]: (1932-) a US composer who has written the music for many well-known films including Fiddler on the Roof (1971), Jaws (1975), Star Wars (1977), E.T. (1982), Schindlerâ€™s List (1993), and Memoirs of a Geisha (2005). Williams has won many awards for his work including Academy Awards, Golden Globes, BAFTAs, and Grammy Awards.
